subject: Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Georg Streitberger of Austria captured a World Cup super-G race Saturday when Bode Miller and three other top Americans skied off the course, perhaps signaling a return to skiiing prominence for Austria.
snippet: Georg Streitberger of Austria captured a World Cup super-G race Saturday when Bode Miller and three other top Americans skied off the course, perhaps signaling a return to skiiing prominence for Austria.
